channel.title: PSConfAsia on Cláudio Silva's Blog

item.title: I will be speaking at PowerShell Conference Asia 2017
item.description: Which better way could I have to launch my blog if not with great news ?! I am so happy and excited to announce that I will be speaking at PowerShell Conference Asia in Singapore! On 28th of October I will be presenting two sessions with the following titles: Next step to your script…turn it into an Advanced Function SQLServer Reporting Services administration new best friend - PowerShell Also, on 26th there will be 2 precon:
